metadata.title: CVE-2021-41396 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Live555 through 1.08 does not handle socket connections properly. A hugenumber of incoming socket connections in a short time invokes theerror-handling module, in which a heap-based buffer overflow happens. Anattacker can leverage this to launch a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
